title: Amtrak, Changing Course, Suspends Covid-19 Vaccine Mandate for Workers
sub_head: Rail operator to allow weekly testing as alternative to vaccination as it seeks to avoid disruptions to train schedules
body:
Amtrak said it would suspend its Covid-19 vaccine mandate for employees, a reversal from last week’s policy stance that the rail company said would allow it to operate its passenger trains as scheduled.
In a letter to employees Tuesday, Amtrak Chief Executive Bill Flynn said the company would allow weekly testing as an alternative to vaccination for workers who don’t have an approved accommodation.
